Proven experience in Scala development and AI training methodologies.

About the job

Join Our Dynamic Team as a Zoho Integration Developer!

As a Zoho Integration Developer, you will play a key role in designing and implementing seamless data synchronization between Zoho CRM, Microsoft Dynamics 365 Business Central, and Shopify. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to develop, test, and deploy efficient integration workflows, ensuring smooth data exchanges and automation.

Develop, test, and deploy integrations for Zoho CRM & Microsoft Business CentrDevelop, test, and deploy integrations for Zoho CRM & Microsoft Business Central, including sales quotes, invoices, inventory, and vendor data.
